extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization a critical infrastructure organization?

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Detection Signatures
extracted_playbook.description: Implement detection signatures to identify and block the placement of ransom notes and block additional SMB traffic from the encryptor system for 24 hours.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Strong Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Require all accounts with password logins to have strong, unique passwords. Implement a password policy for devices with local administrative accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Require multi-factor authentication for all services, particularly for webmail, VPNs, and accounts accessing critical systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Patch and Update Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Keep all operating systems and software up to date to minimize exposure to cybersecurity threats.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Access to Resources Over the Network
extracted_playbook.description: Remove unnecessary access to administrative shares and restrict privileges. Use a host-based firewall to allow connections to administrative shares via SMB from a limited set of administrator machines.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Segmentation and Traversal Monitoring
extracted_playbook.description: Segment networks to prevent ransomware spread and use network monitoring tools to detect abnormal activity and potential traversal of ransomware.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Admin Disabling Tools for Identity and Privileged Access Management
extracted_playbook.description: Implement time-based access for admin-level accounts and disable command-line and scripting activities to prevent privilege escalation and lateral movement.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Storage of Clear Text Passwords in LSASS Memory
extracted_playbook.description: Disable or limit NTLM and WDigest Authentication and implement Credential Guard for Windows 10 and Server 2016.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize AD Attack Surface
extracted_playbook.description: Reduce malicious ticket-granting activity by setting a strong password policy for service accounts and auditing Domain Controllers for Kerberos Ticket-Granting Service requests.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement and Enforce Backup and Restoration Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Maintain offline backups of data, ensure backups are encrypted and immutable, and cover the entire organization's data infrastructure.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Additional Mitigations for Industrial Control Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Review joint CISA-FBI Cybersecurity Advisory AA21-131A for additional mitigations to reduce the risk of severe business or functional degradation from ransomware attacks.
